Title: Doraemon: Benkyou Heya no Tsuribori
Description: ['The pilot to ', Doraemon (1979), ". It was created in 1978 but was released to the public as the first special double-billed with episode 159 in the same timeslot. In it, Doraemon creates a fishing pond in Nobita's room so he could play around instead of studying."]
